edit.title: Edit Program
edit.isMultiCoach: This program will be co-delivered with other Nebula coaches.
edit.targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g., Aspiring PMs with 0-2 years experience
edit.objectivesRequired: Please add at least one objective

step1.title: Propose an Immersion Program
step1.description: Nebula Immersion Programs are selective, cohort-based experiences led by industry experts.
step1.condition1: I am an expert in the topic I'm proposing and have significant real-world experience.
step1.condition2: I can commit to hosting live sessions and providing feedback for the duration of the 3-week program.
step1.condition3: The materials and structure I provide are my original work or I have the rights to use them.

step2.title: Program Details
step2.description: Structure your program, define modules, and specify who will be coaching.
step2.programDescriptionPlaceholder: Provide a short, compelling description of your program...
step2.targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g., Aspiring PMs with 0-2 years experience
step2.multiCoachLabel: This program will be co-delivered with other Nebula coaches.

step3.title: Program Materials
step3.description: Upload any documents, slides, templates, or other resources for each module of your program. (Optional)
step3.noModules: No modules defined yet. Please go back to Step 2 to add modules.

step4.title: Review and Submit
step4.description: Please review your program proposal carefully before submitting.
step4.noMaterials: No materials uploaded for this module.

step5.submittingDescription: Please wait while we upload your materials and process your application.
step5.submittingHint: This may take a moment if you have uploaded files.
step5.successDescription: Your Immersion Program proposal has been successfully submitted.
step5.successNote: Our team will review your application and get back to you shortly.
step5.confirmationValue: A confirmation has been sent to you

hero.heading:
Empower your career
journey with Nebula
hero.description: Get online career coaching from the world's leading experts to help you land your dream job.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search for a coach or specialty...

home.intermediate: We’re not just an AI platform. Our qualified coaches work alongside you, offering expert guidance that elevates your experience and accelerates your growth.

vetted.title: Vetted Coaches, Proven Results
vetted.description: Our coaches are industry leaders with years of experience in their respective fields.

personalized.title: Personalized Learning Paths
personalized.description: Tailored guidance to help you achieve your specific career goals and aspirations.

flexible.title: Flexible Scheduling & Support
flexible.description: Book sessions that fit your schedule and get support from our dedicated team.

testimonials.title: This is what your peers have to say

sarah.content: Nebula connected me with a fantastic coach who helped me land my dream job. The personalized advice was a game-changer!

david.content: The mock interviews were incredibly realistic. I felt so much more confident going into the real thing. Highly recommend!

emily.content: I was feeling stuck in my career. My coach provided the clarity and strategy I needed to move forward. Thank you, Nebula!

network.title: Global Community of Coaches
network.description: Our network comprises professionals from world-renowned institutions and top-tier companies. We bridge the gap between academic theory and real-world application, offering you unparalleled access to insider knowledge and career opportunities.

popular.subtitle: Explore our most sought-after coaching programs designed for success.
